languages.text: {n}Кассия осторожно обхватывает ваше лицо прохладными ладонями, и ее когти чуть впиваются в кожу у самых висков.{/n} "Доверьтесь мне, смотрите только на меня". {n}Все ваше внимание концентрируется на двух рубинах, сияющих неярким отблеском на лице Леди-Навигатора. И чувствуете, как чужая воля поглощает все ваше естество, все эмоции и переживания. Не остается ничего — и в этом ничем растворяются потускневшие краски мира. И беспокойные всполохи Комморры, и умиротворенное свечение серебра вокруг хрупкой фигуры Кассии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия осторожно обхватывает ваше лицо прохладными ладонями, и ее когти чуть впиваются в кожу у самых висков.{/n} "Доверьтесь мне, смотрите только на меня". {n}Все ваше внимание концентрируется на двух рубинах, сияющих неярким отблеском на лице Леди-Навигатора. И чувствуете, как чужая воля поглощает все ваше естество, все эмоции и переживания. Не остается ничего — и в этом ничем растворяются потускневшиек краски мира. И беспокойные всполохи Комморры, и умиротворенное свечение серебра вокруг хрупкой фигуры Кассии.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅小心翼翼地用冰冷的双手捧住你的面孔，尖利的指甲轻轻刺入你的太阳穴。{/n}“相信我。看着我，不要移开视线。”{n}你全神贯注地盯着卡西娅那双闪烁着柔美光辉的红宝石眼睛。片刻之后，你感到她的意志吞噬了你的存在，吞噬了你的所有情感与忧虑，什么也没有剩下。广袤的虚无消解了周围暗淡的色彩、科摩罗汹涌的闪回记忆，以及卡西娅周身宁静的淡淡银光。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅小心翼翼地用冰冷的双手捧住你的面孔，尖利的指甲轻轻刺入你的太阳穴。{/n}“相信我。看着我，不要移开视线。”{n}你全神贯注地盯着卡西娅那双闪烁着柔美光辉的红宝石眼睛。片刻之后，你感到她的意志吞噬了你的存在，吞噬了你的所有情感与忧虑，什么也没有剩下。广袤的虚无消解了周围暗淡的色彩、科摩罗汹涌的闪回记忆，以及卡西娅周身宁静的淡淡银光。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia legt vorsichtig ihre kalten Hände um dein Gesicht. Ihre Klauen bohren sich ganz leicht in die Haut an deinen Schläfen.{/n} "Vertraut mir, und hört nie auf, mich anzusehen." {n}Du konzentrierst dich auf die zwei sanft glitzernden Rubine auf Cassias Gesicht. Einen Augenblick später spürst du, wie ihr Wille dein Wesen verschlingt, all deine Emotionen und Sorgen. Was bleibt, ist nichts. Und dieses Nichts löst die verblassenden Farben der Welt um euch herum auf, Commorraghs turbulente Blitze, und den friedlichen silbernen Glanz um Cassias schlanke Gestalt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}

Ihre Klauen bohren sich ganz leicht in die Haut an deinen Schläfen.{/n} "Vertraut mir, und hört nie auf, mich anzusehen." {n}Du konzentrierst dich auf die zwei sanft glitzernden Rubine auf Cassias Gesicht. Einen Augenblick später spürst du, wie ihr Wille dein Wesen verschlingt, all deine Emotionen und Sorgen. Was bleibt, ist nichts. Und dieses Nichts löst die verblassenden Farben der Welt um euch herum auf, Commorraghs turbulente Blitze, und den friedlichen silbernen Glanz um Cassias schlanke Gestalt.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia pose délicatement ses mains froides sur votre visage, en enfonçant légèrement ses griffes dans la peau de vos tempes.{/n} « Faites-moi confiance et ne me quittez pas des yeux. » {n}Vous vous concentrez sur les deux rubis luisant faiblement dans le visage de Cassia. Un instant plus tard, vous sentez sa volonté dévorer votre être, vos émotions et vos craintes. Il ne reste rien, et ce rien dissout les couleurs qui s'estompent du monde alentour, les éclairs turbulents de Commorragh et la lueur argentée paisible autour de la fine silhouette de Cassia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia pose délicatement ses mains froides sur votre visage, en enfonçant légèrement ses griffes dans la peau de vos tempes.{/n} « Faites-moi confiance et ne me quittez pas des yeux. » {n}Vous vous concentrez sur les deux rubis luisant faiblement dans le visage de Cassia. Un instant plus tard, vous sentez sa volonté dévorer votre être, vos émotions et vos craintes. Il ne reste rien, et ce rien dissout les couleurs qui s'estompent du monde alentour, les éclairs turbulents de Commorragh et la lueur argentée paisible autour de la fine silhouette de Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia coloca sus manos frías alrededor de tu cara, sus garras se clavan ligeramente en tu piel a la altura de las sienes.{/n} «Confíe en mí y no deje de mirarme en ningún momento». {n}Te concentras en los dos rubíes que brillan suavemente en el rostro de Cassia. Un instante después, sientes que su voluntad consume tu ser, todas tus emociones y preocupaciones. No queda nada y esa nada disuelve los colores tenues del mundo que os rodea, los turbulentos destellos de Commorragh y el apacible resplandor plateado en torno a la esbelta figura de Cassia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia coloca sus manos frías alrededor de tu cara, sus garras se clavan ligeramente en tu piel a la altura de las sienes.{/n} «Confíe en mí y no deje de mirarme en ningún momento». {n}Te concentras en los dos rubíes que brillan suavemente en el rostro de Cassia. Un instante después, sientes que su voluntad consume tu ser, todas tus emociones y preocupaciones. No queda nada y esa nada disuelve los colores tenues del mundo que os rodea, los turbulentos destellos de Commorragh y el apacible resplandor plateado en torno a la esbelta figura de Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは慎重に、あなたの顔を包むように冷たい手を置く。彼女の爪が、こめかみ部分の皮膚にわずかに食い込む。{/n}「私を信じてください、そしてずっと私を見ていてください」{n}あなたはカシアの顔にある、優しく輝く2つのルビーに集中する。ややあって、あなたは彼女の意志が、あなたの存在、すべての感情と迷いを飲み込むのを感じる。そこに残っているものは何もない…そしてその無が、周囲の世界の薄暗くなる色、コモラフの荒れ狂う閃光、そしてカシアのほっそりした姿の周囲にある穏やかな銀色の光を溶かしていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia, soğuk ellerini uzatıp dikkatlice yüzünü kavrıyor. Pençeleri hafifçe şakaklarına batıyor.{/n} "Güven bana, gözlerini de sakın ayırma." {n}Cassia'nın yüzünde hafifçe ışıldayan yakutlara odaklanıyorsun. Çok geçmeden tüm benliğinin, duygularının, korkularının onun iradesine teslim olduğunu hissediyorsun. Geriye yalnızca bir hiçlik kalıyor... Bu hiçlik de etrafındaki loş renkleri, Commorragh'ın çalkantılı ışıklarını ve Cassia'nın ince bedenini çevreleyen huzurlu gümüş ışığı bir bir söndürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia carefully places her cold hands around your face, her claws slightly digging into your skin at the temples.{/n} "Trust me, and never stop looking at me." {n}You focus on the two softly glittering rubies on Cassia's face. A moment later, you feel her will consume your being, all your emotions and worries. What remains is nothing — and this nothing dissolves the dimming colours of the surrounding world, Commorragh's turbulent flashes, and the peaceful silvery glow around Cassia's slender figure.{/n}
